item.title: Every Movie I Watched in 2023
item.description: In 2023 I watched a measly 12 movies. That’s not a lot, but one benefit of that is that it means I can quite easily write up a quick review for each of them from memory. All of these reviews are crossposted on my letterboxd. 1. All My Friends Hate Me This is Social Anxiety: the Horror Movie. Is it actually a horror movie? Yes, but no. Is it a comedy?
